\begin{thebibliography}{References}
\bibitem{key-1}D. Malacara, M. Servin, and Z. Malacara, {[}\textit{Interferogram
Analysis for Optical Testing}{]} (CRC, 2005), 2nd ed.

\bibitem{key-2}K. Freischlad and C. L. Koliopoulos, \textquotedblleft{}Fourier
description of digital phase-measuring interferometry,\textquotedblright{}
Journal of the Optical Society of America A 7, 542 (1990).

\bibitem{key-3}M. Servin, J. C. Estrada, J. A. Quiroga, J. F. Mosino,
and M. Cywiak, \textquotedblleft{}Noise in phase shifting interferometry,\textquotedblright{}
Opt. Express 17, 8789\textendash{}8794 (2009).

\bibitem{key-4} J. Schwider, R. Burow, K. E. Elssner, J. Grzanna,
R. Spolaczyk, and K. Merkel, \textquotedblleft{}Digital wave-front
measuring interferometry: some systematic error sources.\textquotedblright{}
Applied optics 22, 3421 (1983).

\bibitem{key-5}C. Ai and J. C. Wyant, \textquotedblleft{}Effect of
piezoelectric transducer nonlinearity on phase shift interferometry,\textquotedblright{}
Appl. Opt. 26, 1112\textendash{}1116 (1987).

\bibitem{key-6}K. Larkin, \textquotedblleft{}A self-calibrating phase-shifting
algorithm based on the natural demodulation of two-dimensional fringe
patterns.\textquotedblright{} Optics express 9, 236\textendash{}253
(2001).

\bibitem{key-7}Y.-Y. Cheng and J. C. Wyant, \textquotedblleft{}Phase
shifter calibration in phase-shifting interferometry,\textquotedblright{}
Appl. Opt. 24, 3049\textendash{} 3052 (1985).

\bibitem{key-8}W. R. C. Rowley and J. Hamon, \textquotedblleft{}Quelques
mesures de dyssymetrie de profils spectraux,\textquotedblright{} Revue
d\textquoteright{}Optique 9, 519\textendash{}531 (1963).

\bibitem{key-9}P. Carre, \textquotedblleft{}Installation et utilisation
du comparateur photoelectrique et interferentiel du Bureau International
des Poids et Mesures,\textquotedblright{} Metrologia 2, 13\textendash{}23
(1966).

\bibitem{key-10} P. Hariharan, B. F. Oreb, and T. Eiju, \textquotedblleft{}Digital
phase-shifting interferometry: a simple error-compensating phase calculation
algorithm,\textquotedblright{} Appl. Opt. 26, 2504\textendash{}2506
(1987).

\bibitem{key-1} Y. Surrel, \textquotedblleft{}Phase stepping: a new
self-calibrating algorithm.\textquotedblright{} Applied optics 32,
3598\textendash{}3600 (1993).

\bibitem{key-2} J. C. Estrada, M. Servin, and J. A. Quiroga, \textquotedblleft{}Easy
and straightforward construction of wideband phase-shifting algorithms
for interferometry,\textquotedblright{} Opt. Lett. 34, 413\textendash{}415
(2009).

\bibitem{key-3}G. Lai and T. Yatagai, \textquotedblleft{}Generalized
phase-shifting interferometry,\textquotedblright{} J. Opt. Soc. Am.
A 8, 822\textendash{}827 (1991).

\bibitem{key-4} I.-B. Kong, \textquotedblleft{}General algorithm
of phase-shifting interferometry by iterative least-squares fitting,\textquotedblright{}
Opt. Eng. 34, 183 (1995).

\bibitem{key-5} Z. Wang and B. Han, \textquotedblleft{}Advanced iterative
algorithm for phase extraction of randomly phase-shifted interferograms.\textquotedblright{}
Optics letters 29, 1671\textendash{}3 (2004).

\bibitem{key-6} Julio C. Estrada, M. Servin, and J. A. Quiroga, \textquotedblleft{}A
self-tuning phase-shifting algorithm for interferometry,\textquotedblright{}
Opt. Express 18, 2632\textendash{}2638 (2010).

\bibitem{key-7} K. G. Larkin, D. J. Bone, and M. a. Oldfield, \textquotedblleft{}Natural
demodulation of two-dimensional fringe patterns. I. General background
of the spiral phase quadrature transform.\textquotedblright{} J Opt
Soc Am A Opt Image Sci Vis 18, 1862\textendash{}70 (2001).

\bibitem{key-8} J. L. Marroquin, J. E. Figueroa, and M. Servin, \textquotedblleft{}Robust
quadrature filters,\textquotedblright{} Journal of the Optical Society
of America A 14, 779 (1997).

\bibitem{key-9} J. L. Marroquin, M. Servin, and R. Rodriguez Vera,
\textquotedblleft{}Adaptive quadrature filters for multiple phase-stepping
images.\textquotedblright{} Optics letters 23, 238\textendash{}40
(1998).

\bibitem{key-10} B. Jahne, Digital Image Processing (Springer, 2005).

\bibitem{key-11} J. Nocedal and S. JW, Numerical Optimization, Operations
Research (Springer, 2006).

\bibitem{key-12} Orlando Medina and Julio C. Estrada. Source code
for Matlab, https://sites.google.com/site/juliocestradarico/academic-notes/source-code01 \selectlanguage{english}%
\end{thebibliography}
